name: Elon Musk Real Life Simulator
description:
The best and hottest videogame on itch.io. Story-rich and fun visual novel with two endings, written on 124 lines of code. Look on screenshots for more information. It took me two days to create this game. Works on Windows, Linux, Mac and even Android! IOS release maybe soon.

LATEST UPDATES:

Soundtrack and DLC called Social Credit Test has been released!

Check them out!
